member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.EdmExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for V3 IEdmType and System.Uri

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.EdmExtensions.FullTypeName(Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmType)
member.summary: Attempts multiple casts on Data.Edm.IEdmType to reach derived classes and extract full name. Implementation taken (copy-pasted and primitiveType case commented) from OData V4 ExtensionMethods.
member.param: OData V3 type to extract name of

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.EdmExtensions.FullName(Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmSchemaElement)
member.summary: Handles specific case of extracting a name from Data.Edm.IEdmSchemaElement. Implementation taken (copy-pasted and primitiveType case commented) from OData V4 ExtensionMethods.
member.param: OData V3 IEdmSchemaElement to extract name of

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.MigrationExtension
member.summary: Contains extension method for IApplicationBuilder to use pipeline provided by this project.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.ODataMigrationOptions
member.summary: Container for parameters to pass into middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.QueryNodeTranslator.VisitNode(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.QueryNode)
member.summary: Filter down the generic Query Node to one of the more specific translation methods listed.
member.returns: Result of any of the V4 Translation processes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.QueryNodeTranslator.Visit(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.ConstantNode)
member.summary: Translates a V3 ConstantNode to V4 ConstantNode. Since node to text translation for Constant nodes is based on literal text, a type-check based conversion is necessary to make the literal text V4 compliant

member.summary: Translates a V3 EntityRangeVariableReferenceNode to V4 ResourceRangeVariableReferenceNode (equivalent)

member.summary: Translates a V3 RangeVariable to a V4 RangeVariable by handling the two cases: entity and nonentity

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.TranslationMiddleware
member.summary: Translation Middleware currently converts V3 URI to V4 URI (future: converts query, request body as well)

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.TranslationMiddleware.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.RequestDelegate,Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.ODataMigrationOptions)
member.summary: Instantiates a translation middleware.
member.param: Contains information necessary for segment translation

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.TranslationMiddleware.#ctor(Microsoft.Data.Edm.IEdmModel,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel,Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.ODataMigrationOptions)
member.summary: Temporary constructor for unit testing given specific models that are already built (rather than passing in by edmx)
member.param: Contains information necessary for segment translation

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.TranslationMiddleware.InvokeAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Middleware

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.TranslationMiddleware.TranslateUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: Accept a V3 request URI and return a V4 request URI. V4 request URI retains base path.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator
member.summary: UriSegmentTranslator contains logic to translate every kind of V3 path segment into its corresponding V4 counterpart path segment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.#ctor(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel)
member.summary: Initialize UriSegmentTranslator
member.param: v4 model is used to look up corresponding entities/etc. from v3 to create v4 segments

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.TypeSegment)
member.summary: Translate a v3 TypeSegment (TODO: EXAMPLE) into v4 TypeSegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.NavigationPropertySegment)
member.summary: Translates a v3 NavigationPropertySegment (TODO: EXAMPLE) into v4 NavigationPropertySegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.EntitySetSegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 EntitySetSegment (e.g. "/Boxes") to a V4 EntitySetSegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.KeySegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 KeySegment (e.g. "/Boxes(1)") to a V4 KeySegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.PropertySegment)
member.summary: Translates at V3 PropertySegment (e.g. "/Boxes(1)/Name") into a V4 PropertySegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.OperationSegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 OperationSegment to V4 OperationSegment by locating all matching function imports in the v4 model and constructing a new V4 OperationSegment with all found operation segments.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.OpenPropertySegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 OpenPropertySegment into its V4 equivalent: a DynamicPathSegment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.CountSegment)
member.summary: Translates V3 CountSegment to V4 CountSegment by simply returning the V4 CountSegment instance, which is what is needed in all cases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.NavigationPropertyLinkSegment)
member.summary: Translates a v3 NavigationPropertyLinkSegment (TODO: EXAMPLE) into v4 NavigationPropertyLinkSegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.ValueSegment)
member.summary: Translates a v3 ValueSegment (e.g. /Boxes(1)/Name/$value) into a v4 ValueSegment

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.BatchSegment)
member.summary: Translates V3 BatchSegment to V4 BatchSegment by simply returning the V4 BatchSegment instance, which is what is needed in all cases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.BatchReferenceSegment)
member.summary: Translates a V3 BatchReferenceSegment to V4 BatchReferenceSegment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.Migration.UriSegmentTranslator.Translate(Microsoft.Data.OData.Query.SemanticAst.MetadataSegment)
member.summary: Translates V3 MetadataSegment to V4 MetadataSegment by simply returning the V4 MetadataSegment instance, which is what is needed in all cases.

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.TestPublicKey
member.summary: TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing purpose only.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKeyToken
member.summary: Product public key token.
